title: Roses Bouquet
description: A stunning bouquet of 12 freshly picked long-stemmed red roses, perfect for special occasions. Each rose is carefully selected for its vibrant color and velvety petals. Elegantly wrapped in kraft paper and tied with a satin ribbon for a heartfelt gesture.

title: Tulip Arrangement
description: A bright and colorful arrangement of 10 mixed tulips in shades of pink, yellow, red, and orange, arranged in a stylish glass vase. These cheerful tulips are perfect for adding a touch of spring to any room.

title: Lilies in Bloom
description: A graceful arrangement of 5 elegant white lilies in full bloom, offering a delightful fragrance and a stunning visual appeal. Presented in a clear vase, making it a perfect centerpiece for any home or event.

title: Orchid Elegance
description: An exquisite arrangement of 3 orchid stems, available in white or purple, symbolizing luxury and sophistication. This stunning bouquet is ideal for gifting or adding a touch of elegance to any space.

title: Sunflower Bundle
description: A cheerful bundle of 6 bright yellow sunflowers with large, bold blooms. Perfect for spreading joy and warmth, these sunflowers are ideal for bringing sunshine to any occasion.

title: Daisy Delight
description: An arrangement of 8 charming daisies in soft pastel colors, including pink, white, and yellow. This sweet and simple bouquet exudes happiness and innocence, making it perfect for any occasion.

title: Peony Perfection
description: A lush arrangement of 5 fragrant peonies, available in shades of pink, coral, and white. These romantic blooms are perfect for adding a touch of elegance and charm to any setting.

title: Mixed Wildflowers
description: A vibrant mix of 15 wildflowers in various colors, bringing the beauty of a meadow into your home. This lively and colorful arrangement includes daisies, poppies, and cornflowers for a natural, free-spirited look.

title: Garden Roses
description: A bouquet of 10 classic garden roses in soft shades of pink, peach, and cream. These timeless blooms are carefully arranged for a touch of elegance and are suitable for any special moment.

title: Hydrangea Hues
description: An arrangement of 3 hydrangea stems in soft blues and pinks. These full, round blooms create a stunning display, making a bold statement in any room.

title: Lavender Love
description: A fragrant bouquet of 12 fresh lavender stems, known for their calming and relaxing properties. Perfect for gifting or enjoying at home, this bouquet brings serenity and beauty into any space.

title: Carnations Classic
description: A classic arrangement of 12 carnations in rich colors, including red, pink, and white. Their long-lasting blooms and vibrant shades make them a great choice for any occasion.

title: Iris Inspiration
description: A stunning arrangement of 7 purple irises, adding elegance and sophistication to any space. Perfect for special occasions or a unique gift for someone special.

title: Gerbera Joy
description: A lively arrangement of 10 bold and colorful gerbera daisies in shades of red, orange, pink, and yellow. These cheerful blooms are perfect for brightening up any celebration.

title: Exotic Bromeliad
description: A stunning tropical bromeliad plant in a vibrant pink hue, perfect for adding an exotic flair to your space. Easy to care for and visually striking, this plant makes a statement.

title: Potted Lavender
description: A beautiful potted lavender plant with delicate purple flowers, bringing both beauty and relaxation to your home. Ideal for adding a touch of nature to your d√©cor.

title: Bird of Paradise
description: An exotic Bird of Paradise flower with its vibrant orange and blue petals, making it a true statement piece. Perfect for adding a tropical touch to any floral arrangement.

title: Alstroemeria Array
description: A colorful arrangement of 10 alstroemeria stems in shades of pink, purple, and yellow. These long-lasting Peruvian lilies are perfect for brightening any room or occasion.

title: Magnolia Magic
description: An elegant arrangement of 5 large magnolia flowers with creamy white petals. Their fragrant, bold blooms bring sophistication and charm to any space.

title: Freesia Fragrance
description: An arrangement of 8 delicate freesia flowers in vibrant shades of purple, yellow, and white. Known for their sweet fragrance, these flowers are a perfect choice for a fresh and aromatic bouquet.
